description: Enticing scents of Spanish broom, acacia, mature orchard fruit and honey set the tone on this delicious white. Boasting depth, complexity and character, the creamy palate delivers layers of ripe yellow apple, vanilla, pear, white almond and a savory note of flinty mineral. Tangy acidity provides balance. It's a great expression of Vernaccia's more serious side and aging potential. Drink through 2019..
